name: Cueteacher
description: No more missed updates. No more repeated logins. No more confusion about what to do next.  The all-new Cueteacher app will help you run your Cuemath centre effectively.  Highlights of the new app: 1. Manage everyday tasks easily - Daily checklists and tasks to streamline your work and provide the best learning outcomes for your students 2. Manage Cuemath class activities - Help children experience Cuemath in the best possible way by easily managing class activities such as marking module completion, reviewing progress, etc. 3. Manage your students - Managing current enrollments and prospective leads with equal ease will make your Cuemath centre much more efficient. 4. Grow your centre - Everything process from sharing growth event collateral to uploading bills has been streamlined to provide a smooth experience.  New Features: - Attendance tracking for every student in your class - Intelligent reminder system which prompts you to take action for important activities such as ordering workbooks, collecting fees, scheduling PTM, managing a growth event, etc. - Separate sections for growth-related activities and for classroom related actions - Optimised Help Centre to provide the right information at the right time  All existing flows such as viewing sheet solutions, assigning CR cards, ordering workbooks, adding new students, collecting fees, etc. have been optimized for a better experience.
